channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole opposite Chapel Close, 4th February
item.description:
Outside Chapel Close
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 36inch long and about 24inches wide, over 4inches deep. This is the ;argest of a series of potholes that now cross the width of the entire road. I witnessed a near miss this morning as two cars approached the potholes from different directions and both had to swerve to miss them almost causing a head-on collision. This road needs fixing NOW!, 4th February
item.description:

item.title: Dumped traffic cone, 4th February
item.description:
